column2: find demos -name '*.ipynb' | while read nb; do \

column4: echo "    Missing test for: $nb -> Expected: test/booktests/tb_$test_base.py"; \

column3: python -W ignore -m coverage run --append --source=../../qmcpy/ -m unittest discover -s . -p "*.py" -v --failfast; \
